fieldHint.hint1: Ex: DotComSecrets, Guaranteed Response Marketing, LLC

fields.fieldTitle: What you're offering to get them to sign up

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Report, Book, Information, Tutorial, Training, Software, Webinar, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Title or Name of what you're offering to get them to sign up

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: DotCom Secrets, The Ebook Secrets Guide, 5 Steps To a New You

fields.fieldTitle: Big payoff / gain they want to have / GET (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: get more customers automatically, how to quickly get more coaching clients

fields.fieldTitle: Big obstacle/negative circumstance/pain you want to avoid

fieldHint.hint1: Starts with a VERB ending in "ING"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: not knowing what to say in your marketing videos, losing money on your ad campaigns, begging for speaking gigs

fields.fieldTitle: Cool "how to"/"reveal" you'll share in what you're offering

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: How to use YouTube to get 5-cent clicks, How to make $10,000 a month from only 100 website visitors a week

fields.fieldTitle: Why are you giving this away for free or S&H?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: I want to share this with as many people as I can, I want to help as many people as I can, if you like this then I believe you'll trust me and want to buy from me in the future

fields.fieldTitle: Day or Date this special offer ends?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Monday, April 21, Christmas Day, Next Friday
